channel.title: Continuous Integration on Ronald's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Continuous Integration on Ronald's Blog

item.title: Using multi-stage YAML pipeline to create and publish NuGet packages
item.description: I’ve recently created a new NuGet package that I published on nuget.org. In order to make the process of creating and publishing this package as smooth and simple as possible, I’ve created a multi-stage YAML pipeline in Azure DevOps.

item.title: Build And Release Hugo Site Using Azure Pipelines
item.description: In this post I’ll give a step-by-step explanation on how I build and publish my Hugo blog site to GitHub Pages using Azure Pipelines.
